# 2.4 Create Checklist Template API endpoints

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-28](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-28/24-create-checklist-template-api-endpoints)
**Priority:** Medium
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

Create FastAPI endpoints for checklist templates.

**File:** backend/app/api/v1/checklist_templates.py

**Template Endpoints (Admin):**

* GET /checklist-templates - List templates (filter by level, group)
* POST /checklist-templates - Create template
* GET /checklist-templates/{id} - Get template with sections and items
* PUT /checklist-templates/{id} - Update template
* DELETE /checklist-templates/{id} - Delete template
* POST /checklist-templates/{id}/sections - Add section
* PUT /checklist-templates/{id}/sections/{section_id} - Update section
* POST /checklist-templates/sections/{section_id}/items - Add item

**Instance Endpoints:**

* GET /projects/{project_id}/checklist-instances - List instances
* POST /projects/{project_id}/checklist-instances - Create instance from template
* GET /checklist-instances/{id} - Get instance with responses
* PUT /checklist-instances/{id} - Update instance status
* POST /checklist-instances/{id}/responses - Add/update item response
* PUT /checklist-instances/{id}/responses/{response_id} - Update response

**Register in router.**
